attributes.title: THE TRAUMA
attributes.review: I cannot even begin to explain my disappointment that accompanied this horrendous app. I was SO excited to finally be a part of the sexism and racism plaguing this country; not to mention the learn more about the lack of leadership regarding COVID. I was so excited as I sit here waiting for the app to download. But it took hours! The wait was just tremendous and I waited for billions and billions of days. FINALLY I got the app but it wanted my phone number?? Like WHAT kind of propaganda and exploitation I this? That wasn’t even the worst part!! I started to notice the app’s influence infiltrating my life a little more everyday. I noticed the paint on the walls becoming a little more orange and my poor dog’s hair turned orange and was balding!! When I woke up the next morning, my entire house and everything in it was orange. Appalled, I immediately deleted the app hoping to reverse the new damage. However, it’s gonna take some serious BLUE influence to reverse this. If anyone has experienced the same trauma due to this app please reach out as there are grounds for a class action law suit to get our billions and billions.

attributes.title: I no longer support trump because of this app
attributes.review: This app is very unacceptable. The way it spreads information is icky. I do not like trump anymore and now realize he is very stinky. Bad app.

attributes.title: GREAT! EXCEPT.... (pls read 🥺)
attributes.review: i opened the app and suddenly the cops that killed breonna taylor were still not arrested. 🤬🤬🤬🤬 so i went to school to see if there was a way to educate ignorant people but i guess they’re long gone 🤪🤪✨trumpets are weird instruments 🎺 and my cat just jumped 😼😎✌️ now he’s looking at my fan. 🙀um chile anyways so if you believe all lives matter then you should believe black lives matter 👑👑👑 because if you don’t then you’re going against yourself ☕️ ☕️ ☕️ but i guess you’re not ready for that conversation 💭🤓🧐😝🤡🤖

attributes.title: Glitches
attributes.review: Doesn’t have accurate news sources. Glitches! Horrible!!

attributes.title: Read people reviews!!
attributes.review: Honestly everything said in the reviews are true , I didn’t believe them so I gave it a look myself and I am disappointed I will never ignore the reviews again🤦🏽‍♀️. This app was a waste of my time🤢.

attributes.title: This app is trashhhh
attributes.review: This app is so bad and so irrelevant.

attributes.title: Like so disrespectful
attributes.review: This app had the audacity to download when I pressed download I did not sign up for this just another liberal lie😤 don’t recommend downloading my fellow trump supporters.

attributes.title: Do not download this app
attributes.review: I was genuinely dissapointed at the construction, usage, and overall performance of this app and who it supports.  It slowed down my phone and took up plenty of further space than necessary.

this app glitches so much and not only that it took days to download. don’t even waste your time. anyway,
